items.sentence: The salad is ready. All we need to do is to add salt and pepper.
It shouldn't take us more than three months to build your house.
From then on, he made it a rule to put T-shirts only on mammals.
We need to come up with some ideas on how to solve this problem.
Tom won't be able to do what he needs to do unless you help him.
It doesn't matter who's to blame. How are you going to fix this?
Don't blame Santa Claus if you don't get any presents this year.
I don't know how I did it. The important thing is that I did it.
It wasn't the biggest fish I'd ever seen, but it was really big.
I want to make sure that we don't make the same mistake Tom did.
